fields.name: level
fields.description: Level of field in the six-level field taxonomy. Ranges from 0-5, in which level 0 is the highest level of aggregation (comprising 19 disciplines) and level 5 is the lowest (basically keywords).

fields.name: score
fields.description: Publication field score. Ranges from 0-1. Interpret this score as the proximity between the publication and the field.

name: fields
description: Array giving the top-scoring fields by level
